类的使用
element.Actor

  • 使用Actor的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    display  
    element  

    • display中Actor的使用

      类型参数类型为Actor的display中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      <A extends Actor>
      java.util.List<A>      		 World.getObjects​(java.lang.Class<A> cls)
      Gets the objects.
      返回Actor的display中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static Actor ActorFactory.getActor​(java.lang.String type)
      Gets the type of actor.
      参数类型为Actor的display中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void World.add​(Actor actor)
      Add different actors to background.
      void World.remove​(Actor actor)
      Removes actors from background.

    • element中Actor的使用

      element中Actor的子类 
      修饰符和类型 类 说明
      class  AngryShark
      The Class AngryShark define all actions and attributes of the actor AngryShark}.
      class  Animal  
      class  AnimalMovementController  
      class  BackgroundImage
      This class define the attributes of background image.
      class  Boat
      Define all attributes and actions of Boat.
      class  Digit
      This class is used for determining the location of the initial scoreboard.
      class  End
      This Class inherit from Actor to define all attributes and action of End Point.
      class  Gangartuar
      This class define all actions and attributes about Gangartuar.
      class  Health
      This Class inherit Actor and is displayed in LevelController.
      class  Log
      This Class inherit Actor and is displayed in LevelController.
      class  Obstacle
      This Class inherit Actor and is displayed in LevelController.
      class  Portal
      The Class Portal define all actions and attributes of a Protal.
      class  Shark
      This Class inherit Actor and is displayed in LevelController.
      class  Turtle
      This Class inherit Actor and is displayed in LevelController.
      class  WetTurtle
      This Class inherit Actor and is displayed in LevelController.
      class  Zombie
      This class defines all actions and attributes about Zombie.
      类型参数类型为Actor的element中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      <A extends Actor>
      java.util.List<A>      		 Actor.getIntersectingObjects​(java.lang.Class<A> cls)
      Gets the intersecting objects.
      <A extends Actor>
      A      		 Actor.getOneIntersectingObject​(java.lang.Class<A> cls)
      Gets the one intersecting object.
